about_the_game:
The third DLC, "Upheaval in Jingxiang," depicts Liu Bei's forces as they fight back against the threat of Elixir that has gripped Jing Province since the death of Yu Ji.

This DLC features a multitude of new content, including:
- New story "Upheaval in Jingxiang"
- New weapon category
- New equipment
- New Divine Beast
- New demons
- New game system
- More challenging difficulty level
- Endgame content expansion

Note:
- You must have an internet connection in order to access various content.
- This content requires the full version of the game, which is sold separately. "Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty" and related updates may also be required.
- There is also a product set which includes this item. Please be careful not to purchase duplicate copies.
- Please visit the official website for more information.
- Completion of the main game may be necessary in order to access some of the Season Pass content.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Violence or Gore

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 11, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8400、AMD Ryzen™ 5 3400G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650 4GB、Radeon RX 570 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48kHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: HDD、720P、30FPS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 11, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-8700、AMD Ryzen™ 5 3600XT
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 6GB、Radeon RX 5700XT 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48kHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: HDD、1080P、60FPS

short_description: Experience new gameplay elements, battlefields, demons, and difficulties in Upheaval in Jingxiang.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
